title: McBain: Let’s Get Silly
description: Known as perhaps the most poorly budgeted film ever, McBain tells jokes in front of a brick wall for 90 minutes.
altHero: McBain on stage at a comedy club
alt1: still on stage, McBain shoots a big gun
alt2: McBain pulls the ring from a grenade
alt4: bright flash and man’s glasses fly in the air
